title: Do you think that triboelectric nanogenerators can be manufactured at low cost in different configurations, making them suitable for driving small electronics such as personal electronics, biomechanical devices and sensors? - Quora

response.answer_text: It will come though it needs a lot more developement as it is. we have nano motors and very low profile motors now, but making them suitable for many applications will need work as they are often very specific to purpose

Is this what you’re asking about? https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Chandan_Kumar56/post/Choosing_Suitable_Materials_for_Triboelectric_Nanogenerators/attachment/5ab9ca64b53d2f0bba5a7d55/AS%3A608652243255302%401522125411980/download/triboelectricity_review.pdf
